name: Miniorange OTP Verification with Firebase
author: miniOrange

sections.description:
OTP VERIFICATION WITH FIREBASE GATEWAY

Plugin allows endusers to login/register with one time password(OTP) with firebase gateway. Plugin uses Firebase Gateway to send and verify OTP. It removes the possibility of users registering with fake Mobile Number by enabling OTP Verification. It allows passwordless login & login with phone number. The OTP Verification plugin also checks if Email Address/Mobile Number of a user already exists.
Follow the link for detailed information on the free and premium plan of the plugin : MiniOrange OTP Verification using Firebase Gateway

FEATURES

  • Login with Phone Number
  • Passwordless login (No need to remember your password anymore!)
  • OTP verification on registration form.
  • Supports country code dropdown
  • Customizable login & registration form.
  • Replace the default WooCommerce Login/Registration Form with the miniOrange Login/Registration Form.
  • OTP Verification on the default WooCommerce Login/Registration Form.
  • OTP Verification on the WooCommerce Checkout Form.
  • OTP Verification on the Ultimate Member Registration Form.
  • OTP Verification on the Ultimate Member Login Form.
  • OTP Verification on the Gravity Form.
  • Allow the admin to decide the role of the user.
  • Allow admin to set up custom redirection after login/ Registration.

How does this plugin work?

  1. On submitting the registration or login form an SMS with OTP is sent to the mobile number provided by the user.
  2. Once the OTP is entered, it is verified and the user gets registered.

SUPPORT

Customized solutions and Support options are available. Email us at otpsupport@xecurify.com/info@xecurify.com.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for miniOrange OTP verification with Firebase. Find and Install Miniorange OTP verification with Firebase
  3. Activate the plugin from your WordPress Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download miniorange-firebase-sms-otp-verification.
  2. Unzip and upload the miniorange-otp-verification directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate miniOrange OTP verification with Firebase from your Plugins page.
sections.faq:
How to setup the plugin?

You can check our setup guide here: Guide

I want support for other forms. What should I do?

To get support for custom forms or a plugin designed form, please email us at otpsupport@xecurify.com/info@xecurify.com with a brief description of your form. You can also submit your query from the plugin’s settings page.

Can you add customized features for me?

To get support for any customized features, please email us at otpsupport@xecurify.com/info@xecurify.com . You can also submit your query from the plugin’s settings page.

For any other query/problem/request

Please email us at otpsupport@xecurify.com/info@xecurify.com . You can also submit your query from the plugin’s settings page.

short_description: OTP Verification with Firebase gateway. PasswordLess Login. Firebase OTP verification on login, registration forms, WooCommerce Checkout, Gravity Form
